external_games.name: Sakuya Izayoi Gives You Advice And Dabs: Nitori Kawashiro Offers You Advice In Exchange For Cucumbers And Eats The Cucumbers

name: Sakuya Izayoi Gives You Advice and Dabs: Nitori Kawashiro Offers You Advice in Exchange for Cucumbers and Eats the Cucumbers
summary:
As you decide to go for a relaxing stroll to the waterfall, all of the sudden someone from another world appears right in front of you! It's none other than Nitori Kawashiro from the Touhou Project!
"Fiances, Friends and Failures. You give me that packet of cucumbers and I can give you a detailed rundown on a topic pertaining to any of those aspects."
Featuring immersive sounds and atmospheric scenes, Nitori will give you insight on some of the most relevant topics in life, not bad for a pack of cucumbers, right?
